name: webdis
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: A very simple web server providing an HTTP interface to Redis. It uses hiredis, jansson, libevent, and http-parser.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
GITHUB_PACKAGE='nicolasff/webdis'

apt update -y
apt install -y make gcc libevent-dev curl jq unzip

mkdir -p /mnt/server/

cd /tmp/

ZIP_URL=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/tags" | jq -r '.[0].zipball_url')

curl -sSL ${ZIP_URL} -o webdis.zip

unzip webdis.zip

mv $(echo $GITHUB_PACKAGE | sed 's,/,-,g')* webdis

cd webdis/

make

mv webdis webdis.json /mnt/server

echo -e "job's done"
